phrs.translation: 追踪的, 依据的, 追赶的, 根据
按照法律, 按照法律英语, 依法
根据已正式注册成立, 妥为成立为法团依据

sentences.sentence: He should continue to act pursuant to the United Nations Security Council resolutions.
sentences.translation: 他应当继续依照美国国家安全委员会的决议采取行动。

sentences.sentence: On the pavements of the major urban roads, blind tracks shall be set up pursuant to the planning.
sentences.translation: 城市主要道路的人行道，应当按照规划设置盲道。

sentences.sentence: The parties to a contract shall fully fulfill their obligations pursuant to the terms of the contract.
sentences.translation: 合同的双方当事人应当按照合同条款，充分地履行各自的义务。
